body_html:
I have faced with the same error of:
external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/../../../Eigen/src/Core/arch/CUDA/PacketMathHalf.h(279): error: identifier "h2log1p" is undefined

GTX 1080 with NVIDIA Driver 367.35, CUDA 8.0rc, CuDNN 5.1 and the current master branch of TF.

EDIT:
I could successfully compile with the branch r0.10
Is there any substantial difference between the r0.10 and the master branch?

body:
I have faced with the same error of:
`external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/../../../Eigen/src/Core/arch/CUDA/PacketMathHalf.h(279): error: identifier "h2log1p" is undefined`

GTX 1080 with NVIDIA Driver 367.35, CUDA 8.0rc, CuDNN 5.1 and the current master branch of TF.

EDIT:
I could successfully compile with the branch r0.10
Is there any substantial difference between the r0.10 and the master branch?
